message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a limited time at $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $200 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $170. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $170 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
